channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Big pile of rubbish on the pavement, 17th December
item.description:
Ait has been there over a week

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kyverdale Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Avenue Road side of Green bridge, 17th December
item.description:
Disgraceful! This is how the street has been left after the roadworks have been cleared. You should be ashamed of yourselves. It’s an absolute disgrace. No wonder people use it as a dumping ground, if the council doesn’t even care. The small hole is deep and actually quite dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avenue Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No lime or forests in pedestrian only spaces. Datchelor Place is pedestrian only, 17th December
item.description:
Stop parking on Datchelor Place. Moved broken bike to end of street.NO PARKING ON DATCHELOR PLACE PEDESTRIAN ONLY

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, Camberwell Church Street, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Corner of Theobalds Road and Holsworthy Square., 17th December
item.description:
The metal bollard on the corner of Theobaolds/Holsworthy (West-side) has been hit by a passing coach and dislodged it causing damage to the curb.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Gray's Inn Road, Holborn, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Alan Cheales Way NW5 4BU, 17th December
item.description:
The tarmac on this alleyway is all broken up and has large potholes in it. This is quite a hazard for people at night and also for people who come out of the side entrance to St Dominic’s Priory on mobility scooters who have to ride across the tarmac. Problem is in the alleyway next to St Dominic’s priory at the corner next to side entrance of church.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alan Cheales Way, Gospel Oak, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 215 A-B, Baring Road, Chinbrook, Grove Park, Greater London

item.title: Outside St Dominic’s Priory NW5, 17th December
item.description:
The pavements here are all very raised and uneven. Creates a large trip hazard for people leaving the church and passers by. Quite a few pavement slabs are out of line around a couple of trees. Location is directly outside St Dominic’s church on Southampton Road NW5.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alan Cheales Way, Gospel Oak, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noisy loose man hole cover Westminster bridge road, 17th December
item.description:
The man hole cover outside 65 Westminster bridge road has become loose and makes an increasingly loud noise when busses , cars etc drive over it. It is keeping us awake at night and getting louder by the day. Please fix it . We’d like to sleep by Xmas
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 65, Westminster Bridge Road, Waterloo, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light outside no. 1 St. Mary’s Avenue, 17th December
item.description:
The light has been out for several months, leaving uneven areas of pavement in darkness.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Valan Leas, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken parking signpost ( Parkers Row, Bermondsey), 17th December
item.description:
A parking signpost is broken and is lying across the pavement, partially obstructing the footway. Please can this be made safe and the sign reinstated. It is located very close to the Most Holy Trinity Roman Catholic Church, Bermondsey. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parker's Row, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal multi occupancy, 17th December
item.description:
This house is being used as an illegal multi occupancy housing. They have up to 6 delivery moped drivers living there and people coming and going. The shed at the back has rats running around as it is full of old beds and rubbish . There is a preschool next door which has had problems with rats since this started.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21,23, Falconwood Parade, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Racist Graffiti, 17th December
item.description:

item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (offensive)

item.title: 7 Great Queen's Street, WC2B 5DH, 17th December
item.description:
A missing drain cover in front of All Good grocery shop, causing a hole in the pavement about 8ins in diameter. I caught my foot in it and only narrowly avoided falling.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wild Street, Greater London
